column5: How bad are the BLACK FLIES and MOSQUITOES this year with all the rain they have been getting? Heading up to the Pickle Lake area in about a week. The last two years we hardly had to break out the bug spray.

May I ask which resort you will be staying at and what species targeting? As for bugs....don't know the report right now but can easily make a call to someone that has been up to Clearwater 3-4 times already this year and just as of last week.
Sorry I meant Pipestone River / Pickle Lake area
Not a bug in sight this past May--I hit ya with a PM. wOULD ENJOY HEARING FROM YA. LEN Michigan
That's because it was snowing, LenrayPaul

Hi Paul yeah Snow for sure. Also I fished everyday with my ole farmer Carharts on. Takes a mighty big and potent bug to bite thru that stuff. I am not the best dressed fella on da water. I see the pics of you Keystoners and the Hawkeye bunch--mighty fine duds you wealthy guys are wearing. Take care you going to half century of progress in Rantoul??? len
I quit buying tractors and started buying better rain gear!Paul
